select.id: select介護認定審査会委員別単価全件

mapper.select:
SELECT
"DbT5034ShinsakaiIinBetsuTanka"."ShinsakaiIinCode" as "dbT5034ShinsakaiIinBetsuTanka_ShinsakaiIinCode", "DbT5034ShinsakaiIinBetsuTanka"."kaishiYM" as "dbT5034ShinsakaiIinBetsuTanka_kaishiYM", "DbT5034ShinsakaiIinBetsuTanka"."shuryoYM" as "dbT5034ShinsakaiIinBetsuTanka_shuryoYM", "DbT5034ShinsakaiIinBetsuTanka"."insertDantaiCd" as "dbT5034ShinsakaiIinBetsuTanka_insertDantaiCd", "DbT5034ShinsakaiIinBetsuTanka"."insertTimestamp" as "dbT5034ShinsakaiIinBetsuTanka_insertTimestamp", "DbT5034ShinsakaiIinBetsuTanka"."insertReamsLoginId" as "dbT5034ShinsakaiIinBetsuTanka_insertReamsLoginId", "DbT5034ShinsakaiIinBetsuTanka"."insertContextId" as "dbT5034ShinsakaiIinBetsuTanka_insertContextId", "DbT5034ShinsakaiIinBetsuTanka"."isDeleted" as "dbT5034ShinsakaiIinBetsuTanka_isDeleted", "DbT5034ShinsakaiIinBetsuTanka"."updateCount" as "dbT5034ShinsakaiIinBetsuTanka_updateCount", "DbT5034ShinsakaiIinBetsuTanka"."lastUpdateTimestamp" as "dbT5034ShinsakaiIinBetsuTanka_lastUpdateTimestamp", "DbT5034ShinsakaiIinBetsuTanka"."lastUpdateReamsLoginId" as "dbT5034ShinsakaiIinBetsuTanka_lastUpdateReamsLoginId", "DbT5034ShinsakaiIinBetsuTanka"."tanka" as "dbT5034ShinsakaiIinBetsuTanka_tanka", "DbT5034ShinsakaiIinBetsuTanka"."sonotatanka" as "dbT5034ShinsakaiIinBetsuTanka_sonotatanka", DbT5594."shinsakaiIinShimei" FROM rgdb."DbT5034ShinsakaiIinBetsuTanka" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5594ShinsakaiIinJoho" DbT5594 ON DbT5594."shinsakaiIinCode" = "DbT5034ShinsakaiIinBetsuTanka"."ShinsakaiIinCode" WHERE "DbT5034ShinsakaiIinBetsuTanka"."isDeleted" = FALSE ORDER BY "DbT5034ShinsakaiIinBetsuTanka"."ShinsakaiIinCode" DESC, "DbT5034ShinsakaiIinBetsuTanka"."kaishiYM" DESC, "DbT5034ShinsakaiIinBetsuTanka"."shuryoYM" DESC

association.property: 介護認定審査会委員別単価
